Posts.Content: Dec 21, 2010 12:19AM tryburzynski wrote: This might sound like a trite answer, but I think you should go to church. The Lord Jesus is the only person who can bring you out of this type of depression. We have lost several family members to suicide because they never found meaning in life. I really believe that a relationship with God will heal you completely...spiritually and emotionally, now that you are physically well.
Posts.Title: 4 years later and I'm still Devastated! bluesky Ellie1959
